summary: Willing to follow you into Battle, Railth is a female Imperial dressed in Dwarven Armor.  She fights with a Dwarven sword but carries a back up sword in case she loses or breaks hers.
descriptionHtml:
in Version 2 she is able to level and starts a bit stronger and she can become a spouse.
please update.
she now is, instead of being rounded for all things, she now specializes in one handed weapons and heavy armor.
The Railth follower mod is simple and really can\'t cause lag.
more to come later mod wise.
um... i cant think as to what else i should say.
upload photos!!
and endorse me?
hahaha, you can take this mod and do what ever you want but please credit me.
thanks.
download it then unzip it and you will get a file named Railth.esp will appear, place this in your data and it will work fine.

YOU CAN FIND HER AT THE SILVER-BLOOD-INN IN MARKATH
author: BlackPheonixGames
